author: Patsy McGarry
title: Four former Jesuit priests and brothers die from Covid-19 in nursing home
description: A quarter of residents in one small south Dublin care home died of the virus last week
content:
Four retired and former Jesuit priests and brothers died at the congregations Cherryfield Lodge nursing home in Dublins Milltown last week. 
The first Covid-19 case there was confirmed on Monday of last week, since when HSE protocols have been applied. With … [+2386 chars]
